name: 盖斯·卡普

last_movies.title: 总是最好的朋友 第一季

introduction: Overview (2)Born	July 5, 1999 in Denver, Colorado, USAHeight	5' 9" (1.75 m)Mini Bio (1)Gus Kamp is an actor, known for The Sleepover (2012), Fairest of the Mall (2014) and Best Friends Whenever (2015).Raised in Denver, Colorado, Kamp began acting at age two. By the age of ten, he was chosen to perform an opening skit for popular comedian David Cross in front of 3,000 people. His television credits include guest appearances on Henry Danger (2014) and Deadtime Stories (2012). He also had a recurring role as a panelist on Beck Bennett's ("Saturday Night Live") popular web series.When he isn't performing, Kamp enjoys writing scripts, poetry and short stories. He also loves to rap, draw, make movies and chat about science.Kamp currently lives in Los Angeles with his family and two cats, Sadie and Cinco, and Chihuahua, Maynard.
